data.text: Zitisa Yave, a muelꞌama.
Niandi wukifukidi muinda banga nledi ;
ayi wutunga makunzi ma bivinga biandi bizangama va minlangu miawu.
Wunkitulanga phemo bamvuala bandi,
Wuvuandisa ntoto va zifondasio ziandi ;
Ngeyo wufukidila wawu mu thipula banga ngeyo wumfukididi nledi,
Vayi bu wutema, minlangu mitina,
Mikumbila va mbata miongo,
Ngeyo wumitudila zindilu ziozi ka milendi sabuka ko ;
Niandi wukubika zitho zi minlangu
Zilembo vani nlangu kuidi bibulu bioso bi tsola,
Zinuni zi yilu zintunganga dianla mu yenda minlangu,
Wulembo lembila miongo tona ku bivinga biandi bizangama ;
Niandi weti menisa biti mu diambu di bibulu,
vinu kieti yangidika ntima wu mutu,
Minti mi Yave midi milembolo bumboti ;
Muawu zinuni zieti tungila zindiala ziawu ;
Miongo mi nangama mivuiwulu kuidi zikhombo zi nsitu ;
Ngondi yeti vasa zitsungi,
Ngeyo weti nata tombi, buisi bueti yila
Zikhosi zillembo kungi mu diambu di biobi zifueti buila
Thangu yawu totuka, buna zivengumukini ;
Buna mutu weti kuenda ku kisalu kiandi,
Phila bisalu biaku bididi woka, a Yave ;
Vadi mbu wumosi, wunneni ayi wuyalumuka ;
Muawu mu nkuendilanga ayi vutukilanga masuwa ;
Bibioso bikutalanga muingi wuba vananga bidia biawu mu thangu yifuana.
Thangu weti kubivana bidia, bieti bonga biawu ;
Ngeyo sueka zizi kiaku, buna bieka mona tsisi.
Ngeyo fidisa vumunu kiaku, buna bivangimini
Bika Nkembo wu Nzambi wuzingila mu zithangu zioso ;
Niandi wuntalanga ku ntoto, ayi ntoto wulembo titi.
Ndiela yimbidilanga Yave mu luzingu luama loso.
Bika mambu mama ndinyindula mammonisa khini
Vayi bika bankua masumu balalukusu va ntoto,
